titleStmt.title: Teares of ioy shed at the happy departure from Great Britaine, of the two paragons of the Christian world. Fredericke and Elizabeth, Prince, and Princesse Palatines of Rhine Duke and Dutches of Bauaria, &c. By R.A.
titleStmt.author: Allyne, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by N. Okes] for Thomas Archer, and are to be sold at his shop in the Popes-head-pallace, neere the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in the Popes-head-pallace, neere the Royall Exchange
